title: Repeated Transaction Occurrence
description: Manages occurrences of repeated transactions, including tracking their modifications or logical deletions. 'transactionId' is required when an occurrence is modified to link it to an actual transaction.

id.description: Unique identifier for the occurrence record.

transactionId.description: Identifier of the actual transaction, required if the occurrence is modified.

repeatedTransactionId.description: Identifier of the associated repeated transaction.

expectedDate.description: The date when the occurrence is expected.

occurrenceStatus.description: Status of the occurrence, indicating if it has been modified or logically deleted.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the occurrence was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last update to the occurrence. Nullable to accommodate occurrences that have not been updated.
